name: Steam Battler
description:
Fight your friends with a collection of Steam cards. Take first place among all players in the world!

How to Play

  • First of all your Steam and Inventory has to be public, then our game could know what cards you have. You can configure that at your Steam profile Privacy Settings.
  • Then you'll need your Steam profile id, which can be found at your Steam profile page url
    Or you can use your custom url
  • That's all! Now download the game and enjoy.
